title: Slayer  -  No Warning (EP) 2015 vbr ak
description:
Slayer was founded in 1981, when guitarist Kerry King met drummer Dave Lombardo. Upon meeting, the two quickly discovered they had similar taste in music and in their aspirations. 
Kerry soon introduced guitarist Jeff Hanneman and recruited Chilean-born bassist and vocalist Tom Araya, who had played with King before in the band Quits (previously known as Tradewinds). 
The band played cover versions of Iron Maiden and Judas Priest songs at clubs and parties in Southern California. 
Early shows relied on a Satanic image, which featured pentagrams, make-up, spikes, and inverted crosses. 
Rumors that the band was originally known as Dragonslayer, after the 1981 movie of the same name, were denied by King, as he stated: "We never were; it's a myth to this day."

But you never know its Metal and anything can happen
